content: **drops crochet neck warmer with bubbles in snow vienna and glitter or snow melody and glitter ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ size approx 62 x 30 cm materials drops snowfrom garnstudio 150g colour no 35 apple green and use drops vienna from garnstudio 100 g colour no 58 yellow-green + a remnant of colour no 42 chocolate brown and use drops glitter from garnstudio 1 spool colour no 01 gold or use drops snow from garnstudio 150g colour no 35 apple green drops melody from garnstudio 100 g colour no 14 vanilla + a remnant of colour no 05 black drops glitter from garnstudio 1 spool colour no 01 gold drops 10 mm us p crochet hook or size needed to obtain correct gauge
